name: ZombarAttack.
description:
-------------------------------------------------------------------------- IMPORTANT: in terms of replaying the game you have to refresh the page or close and open the
game(download) again  due to a bug that i couldn't fix in time
and make sure to play at full screen mode a game where you have to defend your bar that is under the attack of a zombie hord  By using the scroll wheel to get up and down and the space button to shoot your knives at them  pick up extra knives while moving and also repair your bar if damage has been taken 

The game and the music has been made by me  Brahimi#3939  while the art goes to SmokyBones22_Marvel#1982
